title: New: Milk & Bone – Daydream
body:
There’s a real classic edge to the songwriting here from Canadian outfit **Milk & Bone**.

Having released their debut album, Little Mourning, back in 2015, the duo (Laurence Lafond-Beaulne and Camille Poliquin) are gearing up for their sophomore album expected next year. At the risk of sounding obnoxiously cliched, Daydream feels like the sound of blissful fantasy – silky smooth vocals and a hook that the whole track pirouettes beautifully around. Check it out below.
